content: this alpine stitch scarf is the perfect accessory for any winter outfit with its chunky yarn and cozy design it will keep you warm all season long this alpine scarf crochet pattern pdf is easy to follow and can be made in any color you like this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level easy finished size approximately 7 wide by 51 5 long hook size us size l/11 8 0 mm yarn category 5 bulky yarn main stitches chain single_crochet double_crochet fpdc the pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy-to-read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 https //www stitching-together com/alpine-stitch-scarf/
